title: In-App Purchase
custom_preconds:
Given the build has been uploaded to Google Alpha
and has been installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the At Bat Monthly option
And purchases the subscription through the Play Store purchase flow
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the transaction is successful
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have At Bat access (Ex. Gameday Audio)
And the user will not see Lite ads

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the At Bat Monthly user then accesses the MLB.tv paywall
And purchases MLB.tv Monthly successfully
And then links to a MLB account on the "Connect Purchase" screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will have access to MLB.tv and Gameday Audio
And the user will not see Lite ads
And the MLB account will display both purchases and entitlements in the CS Tool

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user uninstalls the build
And reinstalls the build
And accesses a paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The App should automatically restore the purchase for the user (see successful toast message)
Then the user's purchases (At Bat Monthly and MLB.tv Monthly) will be restored
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have At Bat and MLB.tv access

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user installs the build on another device
And launches the app
And accesses a paywall
And logs in with their MLB account (FROM STEP 2)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will have access to At Bat and MLB.tv

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user uninstalls the build
And reinstalls the build
And the user taps the At Bat Yearly option
And purchases through the Play Store purchase flow
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the transaction is successful
And the user can link to their MLB account on the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have At Bat access (Ex. Gameday Audio)
And the user will not see Lite ads

title: Lite User Gating
custom_preconds: Given a Lite user opens At Bat in Prod
custom_steps: Then the user should see the following when they perform the action

custom_steps_separated.content: Taps on the Gameday Audio button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Sees an At Bat Paywall
with Monthly and Yearly options

custom_steps_separated.content: Taps on Free Game of the Day from TV EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: Sees Login screen with Free Game messaging

Sees an Buy At Bat upsell button
that launches the At Bat paywall
